tool_description: Encode barcode numbers to generate images or decode images to barcode numbers. Multiple different barcode formats supported.
name: Barcode
title: Barcode

api_list.name: /barcode/encode
api_list.description: Get a Bar Code image for the given barcode number

optional_parameters.name: barcodeformat
optional_parameters.description: Barcode format default C39. Valid values are the keys to those returned from /barcode/encode/types.

optional_parameters.name: outputformat
optional_parameters.description: Output image format. Must be one of png/html/jpg/svg

api_list.name: /barcode/decode/types
api_list.description: Get the supported barcode types for the decoding process.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://barcode4.p.rapidapi.com/barcode/decode/types"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "barcode4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /barcode/encode/types
api_list.description: Get the supported barcode types for encoding / image generation.
